io.github.nikmang.stevecoin.crypto

Class Wallet

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.nikmang.stevecoin.crypto.Wallet

  • public class Wallet
extends java.lang.Object
    A single user's wallet which contains coins.
    Very basically, a wallet's coin count is actually just a bunch of unspent transactions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Wallet()
      Constructor for a new wallet.
      This shoould be used if the private and public keys do not exist for a user.
      Wallet(java.security.PrivateKey privateKey, java.security.PublicKey publicKey)
      Constructor for a wallet.
      This should be used when a player already has made a wallet before and hence possesses both private and public keys.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Wallet

        public Wallet(java.security.PrivateKey privateKey,
              java.security.PublicKey publicKey)
        Constructor for a wallet.
        This should be used when a player already has made a wallet before and hence possesses both private and public keys.
        Parameters:
        privateKey - The private key for a user.
        publicKey - The public key for a user.

      • Wallet

        public Wallet()
        Constructor for a new wallet.
        This shoould be used if the private and public keys do not exist for a user.

    • Method Detail

      • sendFunds

        public Transaction sendFunds(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,TxOut> uTxOuts,
                             java.security.PublicKey recipient,
                             double value)
        Sends funds from this wallet to a different, designated one.
        Parameters:
        uTxOuts - List of all current unspent outgoing transactions.
        recipient - Recipient of the coins.
        value - Amount of coins to be sent.
        Returns:
        Transaction which is responsible for this coin movement. null if there are insufficient coins.

      • getBalance

        public double getBalance(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,TxOut> uTxOuts)
        Get the current balance of a wallet.
        Parameters:
        uTxOuts - List of all current unspent outgoing transactions.
        Returns:
        amount of money a person has.
